snippet: After a disappointing jobs report increased demand for bonds and pushed down their yields, investors turned to income-paying utility stocks.
abstract: Stock market gets a lift from cease-fire deal between Ukraine and Russian-backed separatists; investors turn to income-paying utility stocks after disappointing August 2014 jobs report, helping push Standard & Poor's 500-stock index to another nominal high.
lead_paragraph: After a disappointing jobs report increased demand for bonds and pushed down their yields, investors turned to income-paying utility stocks.

headline.main: Dividend Search Drives Up Utilities and S.&P. 500
headline.print_headline: Dividend Search Drives Up Utilities and S.&P. 500
